```{r }
library(OpenImageR)
library(EBImage)

library("dplyr")

dir <- "../data/train/"
dir_names <- list.files(dir)
num <- length(list.files(dir))

# load 1 image for shape info
img <- readImage(paste0(dir,  dir_names[1]))
h <- HOG(img,cells = 8,orientations = 9)


# store the HOG features
M <- matrix(NA, num_files,length(h)) 

for(i in 1:num_files){
  img <- readImage(paste0(dir, dir_names[i]))
  M[i,] <- HOG(img,cells = 8,orientations = 9)
}

# output features
write.csv(M, file = "../output/hog_features.csv",row.names = F)
```
